name: instacart
description: This website is a clone of instacart.com made as a frontend task for selection in Code Utsave web developer team.  ### **Tech Stack I will be using and reasons:**  ##### *Vanilla JS:**  For minor interactions I will be using vanilla JS (ES6 +). ##### **CSS3:** I will be using pure css. ##### **Node js:** If I get time to add some feature related to server, I will integrate Node js (Express) with the frontend using netlify as the deployment server.
